item.description:
The Vanilla Bean cafe in Pomfret often hosts excellent live musicians, particularly folk musicians and singer/songwriters. Kris Delmhorst will be performing on Saturday, April 6th. The show begins at 8 pm, but we'll get there at 7 to reserve a table, chat, and have some food and drink before the set opens.

Here's a clip of Kris Delmhorst performing: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1R64HfG5bFk

The Vanilla Bean's website: http://www.thevanillabeancafe.com/

There is a cover charge for the show, probably somewhere around 15$, but it hasn't been listed yet. I will update as we get closer to the date. :)

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Kris Delmhorst, folk musician, plays @ the Bean! :)
